General.Name: Aedas Homes SL
General.Description: Aedas Homes, S.A. engages in the development of residential homes in Spain. The company focuses on multi- and single-family homes; and provides real estate services, as well as rents properties. It serves individuals and institutional investors. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Madrid, Spain. Aedas Homes, S.A. is a subsidiary of Hipoteca 43 Lux S.à.r.l.
General.Address: Paseo de la Castellana, 42, Madrid, Spain, 28046
